00172 void CCELFileHeaderData::Clear()
00173 {
00174         m_nRows = 0;
00175         m_nCols = 0;
00176         m_nCells = 0;
00177         if (m_ParameterIndices.size() > 0)
00178                 m_ParameterIndices.clear();
00179         if (m_Parameters.size() > 0)
00180                 m_Parameters.clear();
00181         m_Header = "";
00182         m_Alg = "";
00183         m_Params = "";
00184         m_DatHeader = "";
00185         m_ChipType = "";
00186         m_CellGrid.upperleft.x = 0;
00187         m_CellGrid.upperleft.y = 0;
00188         m_CellGrid.upperright.x = 0;
00189         m_CellGrid.upperright.y = 0;
00190         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x = 0;
00191         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y = 0;
00192         m_CellGrid.lowerright.x = 0;
00193         m_CellGrid.lowerright.y = 0;
00194         m_Margin = 0;
00195         m_nOutliers = 0;
00196         m_nMasked = 0;
00197         m_Magic = CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER;

00207 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetHeader()
00208 {
00209         SetDatHeader();
00210         char paramString[2000];
00211         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\nTotalX=%d\nTotalY=%d\nOffsetX=%d\nOffsetY=%d\n"
00212                                 "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\nGridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
00213                                 "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s\nAlgorithm=%s\n",
00214                                 m_nCols, m_nRows,
00215                                 m_nCols, m_nRows,
00216                                 0,0,
00217                                 m_CellGrid.upperleft.x, m_CellGrid.upperleft.y,
00218                                 m_CellGrid.upperright.x, m_CellGrid.upperright.y,
00219                                 m_CellGrid.lowerright.x, m_CellGrid.lowerright.y,
00220                                 m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x, m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y,
00221                                 0,0,0,
00222                                 m_DatHeader.c_str(),
00223                                 m_Alg.c_str());
00224 
00225         m_Header = paramString;
00226         m_Header += "AlgorithmParameters=";
00227         m_Header += GetAlgorithmParameters();
00228         m_Header += "\n";
00229         return m_Header;
00230 }

00238 void CCELFileHeaderData::SetDatHeader()
00239 {
00240         if ((m_ChipType.length() > 0) && (m_DatHeader.length() == 0))
00241         {
00242                 char scanInfo[2000];
00243                 snprintf(scanInfo,sizeof(scanInfo), " %c %c %s.1sq %c %c %c %c %c %c %c %c %c ",
00244                         DELIMCHAR,
00245                         DELIMCHAR,
00246                         m_ChipType.c_str(),
00247                         DELIMCHAR,
00248                         DELIMCHAR,
00249                         DELIMCHAR,
00250                         DELIMCHAR,
00251                         DELIMCHAR,
00252                         DELIMCHAR,
00253                         DELIMCHAR,
00254                         DELIMCHAR,
00255                         DELIMCHAR);
00256                 m_DatHeader = scanInfo;
00257         }
00258         else if ((m_ChipType.length() > 0) && (m_DatHeader.length() > 0))
00259         {
00260                 std::string temp = "";
00261                 std::string::size_type index = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR);
00262                 if (index != std::string::npos)
00263                 {
00264                         index = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR, index + 1);
00265                         if (index != std::string::npos)
00266                         {
00267                                 std::string::size_type indexEnd = m_DatHeader.find(".1sq", index);
00268                                 if (indexEnd != std::string::npos)
00269                                 {
00270                                         if (m_DatHeader.substr(index + 2, indexEnd - index) != m_ChipType)
00271                                         {
00272                                                 temp = m_DatHeader.substr(0, index + 2);
00273                                                 temp += m_ChipType;
00274                                                 temp += m_DatHeader.substr(indexEnd);
00275                                         }
00276                                         else 
00277                                                 temp = m_DatHeader;
00278                                 }
00279                                 else
00280                                 {
00281                                         indexEnd = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR, index + 1);
00282                                         if (indexEnd != std::string::npos)
00283                                         {
00284                                                 if (m_DatHeader.substr(index + 2, indexEnd - index - 1) != m_ChipType)
00285                                                 {
00286                                                         temp = m_DatHeader.substr(0, index + 2);
00287                                                         temp += m_ChipType;
00288                                                         temp += ".1sq";
00289                                                         temp += m_DatHeader.substr(indexEnd);
00290                                                 }
00291                                                 else 
00292                                                         temp = m_DatHeader;
00293                                         }
00294                                 }
00295                         }
00296                         else
00297                                 temp = m_DatHeader;
00298                 }
00299                 else
00300                         temp = m_DatHeader;
00301 
00302                 m_DatHeader = temp;
00303         }
00304 }

00312 
00313 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseDatHeader()
00314 {
00315         const char *pInfo = strstr(m_Header.c_str(), "DatHeader=");
00316         if (pInfo != NULL)
00317         {
00318                 const char *pEnd = strchr(pInfo, '\n');
00319                 if (pEnd != NULL)
00320                 {
00321                         char *str = new char [pEnd - pInfo - 10 + 1];
00322                         strncpy(str, pInfo + 10, pEnd - pInfo - 10);
00323                         str[pEnd - pInfo - 10] = '\0';
00324                         m_DatHeader = str;
00325                         delete [] str;
00326                 }
00327         }
00328 }
00329 
00336 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseChipType()
00337 {
00338         // Determine the array type from the header.
00339         // chip type is between second and third delimiters
00340         const char *pInfo = strchr(m_Header.c_str(), DELIMCHAR);
00341         if (pInfo != NULL)
00342         {
00343                 pInfo = strchr(pInfo + 1, DELIMCHAR);
00344                 if ((pInfo != NULL) && *(++pInfo))  
00345                 {
00346                         pInfo++;
00347                         const char *pEnd = strchr(pInfo, '.');
00348                         if (pEnd == NULL)  
00349                         {
00350                                 pEnd = strchr(pInfo, DELIMCHAR);
00351                                 if (pEnd != NULL)
00352                                         pEnd--;
00353                         }
00354                         if (pEnd != NULL)
00355                         {
00356                                 char *str = new char [pEnd - pInfo + 1];
00357                                 strncpy(str, pInfo, pEnd - pInfo);
00358                                 str[pEnd - pInfo] = '\0';
00359                                 m_ChipType = str;
00360                                 delete [] str;
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363         }
00364 }
00365 
00372 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseAlgorithmParameters()
00373 {
00374         if (m_Params.length() > 0)
00375         {
00376                 int iStart = 0;
00377                 int iEnd = 0;
00378                 int iLen = (int) m_Params.length() - 1;
00379                 std::string tag = "";
00380                 std::string value = "";
00381                 for (int i = 0; i < iLen; i++)
00382                 {
00383                         if ((m_Params.at(i) == ':') || (m_Params.at(i) == '='))
00384                         {
00385                                 tag = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 1));
00386                                 iStart = i + 1;
00387                                 iEnd = iStart;
00388                         }
00389                         else if ((m_Params.at(i) == ';') || (m_Params.at(i) == ' '))
00390                         {
00391                                 value = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 1));
00392                                 AddAlgorithmParameter(tag, value);
00393                                 iStart = i + 1;
00394                                 iEnd = iStart;
00395                         }
00396                         else
00397                                 iEnd = i;
00398                 }
00399                 value = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 2));
00400                 AddAlgorithmParameter(tag, value);
00401         }
00402 }
00403 
00413 void CCELFileHeaderData::AddAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag, const char *value)
00414 {
00415         assert(tag != NULL);
00416         assert(value != NULL);
00417 
00418         std::string strTag = tag;
00419         std::string strValue = value;
00420 
00421         AddAlgorithmParameter(strTag, strValue);
00422 }
00423 
00433 void CCELFileHeaderData::AddAlgorithmParameter(std::string& tag, std::string& value)
00434 {
00435         assert(tag != "");
00436         assert(value != "");
00437 
00438         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(tag);
00439         if (pos == m_Parameters.end())
00440         {
00441                 int index = (int) m_Parameters.size() + 1;
00442                 m_ParameterIndices.insert(std::make_pair(index, tag));
00443                 m_Parameters.insert(std::make_pair(tag, value));
00444         }
00445 }
00446 
00455 void CCELFileHeaderData::SetAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag, const char *value)
00456 {
00457         assert(tag != NULL);
00458         assert(value != NULL);
00459 
00460         std::string strTag = tag;
00461         std::string strValue = value;
00462         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00463         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00464                 pos->second = strValue;
00465 }

00495 void CCELFileHeaderData::SetAddAlgorithmParameter(std::string& tag, std::string& value)
00496 {
00497         assert(tag != "");
00498         assert(value != "");
00499 
00500         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(tag);
00501         if (pos != m_Parameters.end()) {
00502                 pos->second = value;
00503         } else {
00504                 int index = (int) m_Parameters.size() + 1;
00505                 m_ParameterIndices.insert(std::make_pair(index, tag));
00506                 m_Parameters.insert(std::make_pair(tag, value));
00507         }
00508 }

00517 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag)
00518 {
00519         assert(tag != NULL);
00520 
00521         std::string strTag = tag;
00522         std::string strValue = "";
00523         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00524         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00525                 strValue = pos->second;
00526         return strValue;

00536 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameterTag(int index)
00537 {
00538         std::string tag="";
00539         std::map<int, std::string>::iterator pos = m_ParameterIndices.find(index+1);
00540         if (pos != m_ParameterIndices.end())
00541         {
00542                 tag = pos->second;
00543         }
00544         return tag;
00545 }
00546 
00553 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameters()
00554 {
00555         std::string strBuffer = "";
00556         std::string strTag = "";
00557         std::string strValue = "";
00558         int iCount = 0;
00559         std::map<int, std::string>::iterator posIndex;
00560         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos;
00561         for (int i = 0; i < (int) m_ParameterIndices.size(); i++)
00562         {
00563                 posIndex = m_ParameterIndices.find(i + 1);
00564                 if (posIndex != m_ParameterIndices.end())
00565                 {
00566                         strTag = posIndex->second;
00567                         pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00568                         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00569                         {
00570                                 strValue = pos->second;
00571                                 if (iCount > 0) strBuffer.append(";"); 
00572                                 strBuffer.append(strTag);
00573                                 strBuffer.append(":"), 
00574                                 strBuffer.append(strValue);
00575                                 iCount++;
00576                         }
00577                 }
00578         }
00579         return strBuffer;
00580 }

00622 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseCorners()
00623 {
00624     // get grid coordinates and size from the header
00625         if (m_Header.length() > 0)
00626         {
00627                 const char* pch = strstr(m_Header.c_str(), "GridCorner");
00628                 int ulx,uly;
00629                 int urx,ury;
00630                 int llx,lly;
00631                 int lrx,lry;
00632                 if ((pch != NULL) &&
00633                         (sscanf(pch, "GridCornerUL=%d %d GridCornerUR=%d %d GridCornerLR=%d %d GridCornerLL=%d %d",
00634                                                 &ulx, &uly,
00635                                                 &urx, &ury,
00636                                                 &lrx, &lry,
00637                                                 &llx, &lly) == 8))
00638                 {
00639                         m_CellGrid.upperleft.x = ulx;
00640                         m_CellGrid.upperleft.y = uly;
00641 
00642                         m_CellGrid.upperright.x = urx;
00643                         m_CellGrid.upperright.y = ury;
00644 
00645                         m_CellGrid.lowerright.x = lrx;
00646                         m_CellGrid.lowerright.y = lry;
00647 
00648                         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x = llx;
00649                         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y = lly;
00650                 }
00651         }
00652 }

00660 bool CCELFileData::Exists()
00661 {
00662   if (ResolveName()=="") {
00663     return false;
00664   }
00665   return true;
00666 }
00667 
00668 std::string CCELFileData::ResolveName()
00669 {
00670         assert(m_FileName != "");
00671 
00672   std::string name;
00673         struct stat st;
00674   // name 
00675   name=m_FileName;
00676   if (stat(name.c_str(), &st) == 0) {
00677     return name;
00678   }
00679   //
00680 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
00681   name=m_FileName+".gz";
00682   if (stat(name.c_str(), &st) == 0) {
00683     return name;
00684   }
00685 #endif
00686   //
00687   return "";
00688 }
00689 
00696 uint32_t CCELFileData::GetFileSize()
00697 {
00698   std::string name=ResolveName();
00699         assert(name != "");
00700 
00701         int32_t lSize = 0;
00702         struct stat st;
00703         if (stat(name.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00704         {
00705                 lSize = st.st_size;
00706         }
00707         return lSize;
00708 }
00709 
00719 bool CCELFileData::Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00720 {
00721         bool retVal = false;
00722 
00723         // First close the file.
00724         Close();
00725 
00726         DetermineFileFormat();
00727         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
00728                 retVal = ReadXDABCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00729         else if (IsTranscriptomeBcelFile())
00730                 retVal = ReadTranscriptomeBCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00731         else if (IsCompactCelFile())
00732                 retVal = ReadCompactBCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00733         else if (IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile())
00734         {
00735                 SetError("This version of compact cel file is no longer supported.");
00736                 retVal = false;
00737         }
00738         else
00739                 retVal = ReadTextCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00740 
00741         return retVal;
00742 }
00743 
00755 bool CCELFileData::ReadXDABCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00756 {
00757         bool retVal = false;
00758   std::string tmp_FileName;
00759 
00760   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
00761   if (tmp_FileName=="") {
00762     SetError("File '"+m_FileName+"' not found");
00763     return false;
00764   }
00765 
00766 #define OPEN_ERR_MSG "Unable to open the file."
00767 
00768 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
00769   // Open the file.
00770         std::ifstream instr;
00771   tmp_FileName=m_FileName;
00772         instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00773   // Check if open
00774   if (!instr) {
00775                 SetError(OPEN_ERR_MSG " (ifstream)");
00776                 return false;
00777         }
00778 #endif
00779 
00780 // #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDIO
00781 //   FILE* instr;
00782 //   tmp_FileName=m_FileName;
00783 //   instr=fopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
00784 //   if (instr==NULL) {
00785 //     SetError(OPEN_ERR_MSG " (stdio)");
00786 //     return false;
00787 //   }
00788 // #endif
00789 
00790 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
00791   gzFile instr;
00792   // try the UNgziped file first.
00793   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
00794   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
00795   if (instr==NULL) {
00796     SetError(OPEN_ERR_MSG " (gzopen)");
00797     return false;
00798   }
00799   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadXDABCel('%s'): open1\n",tmp_FileName.c_str());
00800 #endif
00801   
00802         Clear();
00803 
00804         // Read the header
00805         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
00806         int32_t magic;
00807 
00808         int32_t version;
00809         int32_t nSubGrids;
00810         // char *sval=NULL;
00811   std::string tmp_str;
00812 
00813         // Read the magic number.
00814         ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
00815         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00816         m_HeaderData.SetMagic(magic);
00817 
00818         // Check if new type.
00819         if (!(magic==CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER))
00820         {
00821                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
00822                 return false;
00823         }
00824 
00825         // Read the version
00826         ReadInt32_I(instr, version);
00827         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00828         m_HeaderData.SetVersion(version);
00829 
00830         // Read the dimensions of the array
00831         int32_t iValue = 0;
00832         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
00833         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00834         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00835         m_HeaderData.SetRows(iValue);
00836         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00837         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00838         m_HeaderData.SetCols(iValue);
00839         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00840         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00841         m_HeaderData.SetCells(iValue);
00842 
00843         // Read the other members.
00844         ReadCString_I(instr, tmp_str);
00845         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00846         iHeaderBytes += tmp_str.size();
00847         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(tmp_str.c_str());
00848 
00849         ReadCString_I(instr, tmp_str);
00850         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00851         iHeaderBytes += tmp_str.size();
00852         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(tmp_str.c_str());
00853 
00854         ReadCString_I(instr, tmp_str);
00855         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00856         iHeaderBytes += tmp_str.size();
00857         m_HeaderData.SetParams(tmp_str.c_str());
00858 
00859         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00860         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00861         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(iValue);
00862         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
00863         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
00864         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(ulValue);
00865         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
00866         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
00867         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue);
00868         ReadInt32_I(instr, nSubGrids);
00869         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00870 
00871         // Set the chip type and DatHeader
00872         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
00873         m_HeaderData.ParseDatHeader();
00874 
00875         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
00876         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
00877 
00878         // Set grid coordinates
00879         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
00880 
00881 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
00882         instr.close();
00883 #endif
00884 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDIO
00885   fclose(instr);
00886 #endif
00887 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
00888   gzclose(instr);
00889 #endif
00890 
00891         // Read the remaining data.
00892         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
00893                 return true;
00894 
00895 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_MEMMAP
00896 
00897 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00898         // Memory map file on windows...
00899         SYSTEM_INFO info;
00900         GetSystemInfo(&info);
00901         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00902                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
00903         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00904         {
00905                 SetError("Failed to open the file for win memory mapping.");
00906                 return false;
00907         }
00908         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
00909         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
00910         {
00911                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
00912                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
00913                 {
00914                         Close();
00915                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
00916                         return false;
00917                 }
00918                 else
00919                 {
00920                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
00921                 }
00922         }
00923 #else
00924         // Memory map file on posix...
00925         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
00926         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
00927         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
00928         if (m_File == NULL)
00929         {
00930                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
00931                 return false;
00932         }
00933         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
00934   // printf("fpos=%u",ftell(m_File)); // debug
00935         delete [] szBuffer;
00936   
00937     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
00938     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
00939     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
00940     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
00941     //printf("=== mmap: %p\n",m_lpFileMap); //jhg
00942     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
00943         {
00944                 Close();
00945     static char buf[2048];
00946     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
00947                 SetError(buf);
00948                 return false;
00949         }
00950         else
00951         {
00952                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
00953         }
00954         if (m_File != NULL) 
00955         {
00956                 fclose(m_File);
00957                 m_File = NULL;
00958         }
00959 #endif // _MSC_VER
00960 
00961 #else
00962   // No memory mapping ...
00963 
00964 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
00965 
00966   // take a guess at how big the uncompressed file is.
00967   int alloc_size=(20*1024) + // approx header
00968     ((FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)*(GetRows()*GetCols())) + // row*col
00969     ((SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)             * GetNumMasked()) + // masked
00970     ((SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)             * GetNumOutliers()); // outliers
00971   // alloc it
00972   m_lpData = new char[alloc_size];
00973 
00974   // do the read -- must be the same file name as above.
00975   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
00976   if (instr==NULL) {
00977     SetError("gzip open failed - take2");
00978     return false;
00979   }
00980   gzseek(instr,iHeaderBytes,SEEK_SET);
00981   int read_size=gzread(instr,m_lpData,alloc_size);
00982   
00983   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadXDABCel('%s')=%d (alloc=%d)\n",tmp_FileName.c_str(),read_size,alloc_size);
00984   gzclose(instr);
00985 
00986 #else
00987 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00988         // Memory map file on windows...
00989         SYSTEM_INFO info;
00990         GetSystemInfo(&info);
00991         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00992                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
00993         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00994         {
00995                 SetError("Failed to open the file for win memory mapping.");
00996                 return false;
00997         }
00998         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
00999         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
01000         {
01001                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
01002                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
01003                 {
01004                         Close();
01005                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
01006                         return false;
01007                 }
01008                 else
01009                 {
01010                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
01011                 }
01012         }
01013 #else
01014   // printf("OPEN: non memory mapped.\n"); //
01015   m_lpFileMap=NULL;
01016   m_File=fopen(m_FileName.c_str(),"r");
01017   if (m_File==NULL) {
01018     SetError("Failed to open file for non-memap open.");
01019     return false;
01020   }
01021   // skip the header
01022   fseek(m_File,iHeaderBytes,SEEK_SET);
01023   // printf("fpos=%u",ftell(m_File)); // debug
01024   // read the entire file into memory...
01025   int32_t datasize = GetFileSize()-iHeaderBytes;
01026   m_lpData = new char[datasize];
01027   size_t read=fread(m_lpData,1,datasize,m_File);
01028   //printf("read=%u  iHeaderBytes=%u\n",read,iHeaderBytes);
01029   if (read!=datasize) {
01030     SetError("Unable to read the entire file.");
01031     return false;
01032   }
01033   //
01034   fclose(m_File);
01035 #endif
01036 #endif // CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01037 
01038 #endif // CELFILE_USE_MEMMAP
01039 
01040         int16_t x=0;
01041         int16_t y=0;
01042         int iCell;
01043 
01044         // "Read" the Mean data
01045         m_pEntries = (CELFileEntryType*)m_lpData;
01046 
01047         // Read the mask data
01048         int iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * (FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE);
01049         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01050         {
01051                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
01052                 {
01053                         // Read the coordinate.
01054                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE)));
01055                         //x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01056                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)));
01057 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01058                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01059                 }
01060         }
01061                 
01062         // Read the outlier data
01063         iOffset += m_HeaderData.GetMasked() * 2 * SHORT_SIZE;
01064         if (m_bReadOutliers)
01065         {
01066                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetOutliers(); iCell++)
01067                 {
01068                         // Read the coordinate.
01069                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE)));
01070                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)));
01071 //                      x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01072 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01073                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01074                 }
01075         }
01076         else
01077                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
01078         if (!m_bReadMaskedCells) m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01079         retVal = true;
01080         return retVal;
01081 }
01082 
01094 bool CCELFileData::ReadTranscriptomeBCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
01095 {
01096   std::string tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
01097         bool retVal = false;
01098 
01099 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01100   // Open the file.
01101         std::ifstream instr;
01102   tmp_FileName=m_FileName;
01103         instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01104   // Check if open
01105   if (!instr) {
01106                 SetError(OPEN_ERR_MSG " (ifstream)");
01107                 return false;
01108         }
01109 #endif
01110 
01111 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01112   gzFile instr;
01113   // try the UNgziped file first.
01114   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
01115   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
01116   if (instr==NULL) {
01117     SetError(OPEN_ERR_MSG " (gzopen)");
01118     return false;
01119   }
01120   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadTranscriptomeBCel('%s'): open1\n",tmp_FileName.c_str());
01121 #endif
01122 
01123         Clear();
01124 
01125         // Read the header
01126         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
01127         float version = 0;
01128         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
01129         uint32_t totalx = 0;
01130         uint32_t totaly = 0;
01131         uint32_t offsetx = 0;
01132         uint32_t offsety = 0;
01133         GridCoordinatesType grid;
01134         unsigned short axisinvertx = 0;
01135         unsigned short axisinverty = 0;
01136         unsigned short swapxy = 0;
01137         std::string scanInfo;
01138         std::string sval;
01139 
01140         // Read the magic number.
01141         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_HEADER_LEN);
01142         iHeaderBytes += BCEL_HEADER_LEN;
01143 
01144         // Check if new type.
01145         if (strncmp(sval.c_str(), BCEL_HEADER_BYTES, BCEL_HEADER_LEN) != 0)
01146         {
01147                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
01148                 return false;
01149         }
01150 
01151         // Read the version
01152         ReadFloat_N(instr, version);
01153         iHeaderBytes += FLOAT_SIZE;
01154         m_HeaderData.SetVersion((int)version);
01155 
01156         // Read header information
01157         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // header struct size
01158         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01159         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01160         ReadFloat_N(instr, version);
01161         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // columns
01162         m_HeaderData.SetCols(ulValue);
01163         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // rows
01164         m_HeaderData.SetRows(ulValue);
01165         ReadUInt32_N(instr, totalx);                                                    // totalx
01166         ReadUInt32_N(instr, totaly);                                                    // totaly
01167         ReadUInt32_N(instr, offsetx);                                                   // offsetx
01168         ReadUInt32_N(instr, offsety);                                                   // offsety
01169         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUL.x
01170         grid.upperleft.x = ulValue;
01171         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUL.y
01172         grid.upperleft.y = ulValue;
01173         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUR.x
01174         grid.upperright.x = ulValue;
01175         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUR.y
01176         grid.upperright.y = ulValue;
01177         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLL.x
01178         grid.lowerleft.x = ulValue;
01179         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLL.y
01180         grid.lowerleft.y = ulValue;
01181         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLR.x
01182         grid.lowerright.x = ulValue;
01183         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLR.y
01184         grid.lowerright.y = ulValue;
01185         m_HeaderData.SetGridCorners(grid);
01186         ReadUInt16_N(instr, axisinvertx);                                               // Axis-invertX
01187         ReadUInt16_N(instr, axisinverty);                                               // AxisinvertY
01188         ReadUInt16_N(instr, swapxy);                                                    // swapXY
01189         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01190 
01191         // Read DatHeader
01192         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // DatHeader length
01193         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01194         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01195         ReadFixedString(instr, scanInfo, ulValue);
01196         if (scanInfo[ulValue - 1] == '\r') scanInfo[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01197         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader(scanInfo.c_str());
01198         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01199 
01200         // Read Algorithm
01201         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // Algorithm length
01202         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01203         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01204         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, ulValue);
01205         if (sval[ulValue - 1] == '\r') sval[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01206         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(sval.c_str());
01207         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01208 
01209         // Read AlgorithmParameters
01210         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // AlgorithmParameters length
01211         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01212         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01213         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, ulValue);
01214         if (sval[ulValue - 1] == '\r') sval[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01215         m_HeaderData.SetParams(sval.c_str());
01216         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01217 
01218         char paramString[2000];
01219         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), 
01220           "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\n"
01221           "TotalX=%u\nTotalY=%u\nOffsetX=%u\nOffsetY=%u\n"
01222           "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\n"
01223           "GridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
01224           "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s\n"
01225           "Algorithm=%s\nAlgorithmParameters=",
01226           m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01227           totalx,totaly,offsetx,offsety,
01228           grid.upperleft.x,grid.upperleft.y,
01229           grid.upperright.x,grid.upperright.y,
01230           grid.lowerright.x,grid.lowerright.y,
01231           grid.lowerleft.x,grid.lowerleft.y,
01232           axisinvertx,axisinverty,swapxy,
01233           scanInfo.c_str(),
01234           m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str());
01235         std::string param = paramString;
01236         param += m_HeaderData.GetParams();
01237         param += "\n";
01238         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(param.c_str());
01239 
01240         // Read cell size
01241         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);
01242         int iOffset = ulValue;
01243         m_HeaderData.SetCells(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA);
01244         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01245         iHeaderBytes += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01246 
01247         // Set the chip type
01248         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01249 
01250         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01251         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01252         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(atoi(m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin").c_str()));
01253 
01254         // Set grid coordinates
01255         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01256 
01257         // Read the remaining data.
01258         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01259                 return true;
01260 
01261 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01262         instr.close();
01263 #endif
01264 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01265   gzclose(instr);
01266 #endif
01267 
01268 
01269 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_MEMMAP
01270         // Memory map file
01271 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01272         SYSTEM_INFO info;
01273         GetSystemInfo(&info);
01274         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
01275                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
01276         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
01277         {
01278                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01279                 return false;
01280         }
01281         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
01282         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
01283         {
01284                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
01285                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
01286                 {
01287                         Close();
01288                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
01289                         return false;
01290                 }
01291                 else
01292                 {
01293                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
01294                 }
01295         }
01296 #else // posix
01297         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
01298         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
01299         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
01300         if (m_File == NULL)
01301         {
01302                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01303                 return false;
01304         }
01305         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
01306         delete [] szBuffer;
01307 
01308     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
01309     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
01310 #ifdef __CYGWIN__
01311         cellf_page_offset -= 1;
01312 #endif
01313     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
01314     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
01315     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
01316         {
01317                 Close();
01318     static char buf[2048];
01319     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
01320                 SetError(buf);
01321                 return false;
01322         }
01323         else
01324         {
01325                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
01326         }
01327         if (m_File != NULL) 
01328         {
01329                 fclose(m_File);
01330                 m_File = NULL;
01331         }
01332 
01333 #endif // if _msc_ver
01334 #endif // celfile_use_mmap
01335 
01336 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01337   int alloc_size=GetFileSize();
01338   m_lpData=new char[alloc_size];
01339   instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(),std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01340   instr.seekg(iHeaderBytes,std::ios::beg);
01341   instr.read(m_lpData,alloc_size-iHeaderBytes);
01342   instr.close();
01343 #endif
01344 
01345 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01346   int alloc_size=
01347     ((SHORT_SIZE+SHORT_SIZE+CHAR_SIZE)*(GetRows()*GetCols())) + // row*col
01348     (100*1024) // add 100k for masked and outliers
01349     ;
01350   m_lpData=new char[alloc_size];
01351   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
01352   gzseek(instr,iHeaderBytes,SEEK_SET);
01353   int read_size=gzread(instr,m_lpData,alloc_size);
01354   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadCompactCelFile('%s')=%d (alloc=%d)\n",tmp_FileName.c_str(),read_size,alloc_size);
01355   gzclose(instr);
01356   
01357 #endif
01358 
01359         // Read the Mean data
01360         uint32_t x = 0;
01361         uint32_t y = 0;
01362         int iCell;
01363         m_pTransciptomeEntries = (CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType*) m_lpData;
01364 
01365         // Read mask size
01366         iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA + UINT32_SIZE;
01367         ulValue = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset));
01368         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR);
01369         iOffset += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01370 
01371         // Read the mask data
01372         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01373         {
01374                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int)m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
01375                 {
01376                         // Read the coordinate.
01377                         x = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE));
01378                         y = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE + UINT32_SIZE));
01379                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01380                 }
01381         }
01382         iOffset += (m_HeaderData.GetMasked() * STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR + UINT32_SIZE);
01383 
01384         // Read outlier size
01385         ulValue = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset));
01386         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR);
01387         iOffset += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01388 
01389         // Read the outlier data
01390         if (m_bReadOutliers)
01391         {
01392                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int)m_HeaderData.GetOutliers(); iCell++)
01393                 {
01394                         // Read the coordinate.
01395                         x = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE));
01396                         y = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE + UINT32_SIZE));
01397                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01398                 }
01399         }
01400         else
01401                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
01402         if (!m_bReadMaskedCells) m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01403 
01404         retVal = true;
01405         return retVal;
01406 }
01407 
01417 bool CCELFileData::ReadCompactBCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
01418 {
01419         bool retVal = false;
01420 
01421   std::string tmp_FileName;
01422   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
01423 
01424   if (tmp_FileName=="") {
01425     SetError("File '"+m_FileName+"' not found");
01426     return false;
01427   }
01428 
01429         // Open the file.
01430 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01431         std::ifstream instr;
01432         instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01433         // Check if open
01434         if (!instr)
01435         {
01436                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
01437                 return false;
01438         }
01439 #endif
01440 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01441   gzFile instr;
01442   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
01443   if (instr==NULL) {
01444     SetError("Unable to open the file." " (gzopen)");
01445     return false;
01446   }
01447   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadCompactBCel('%s')\n",tmp_FileName.c_str());
01448 #endif
01449   
01450         Clear();
01451 
01452         // Read the header
01453         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
01454         int32_t version;
01455         int32_t nSubGrids;
01456   std::string tmpstr;
01457 
01458         // Read the magic number.
01459         std::string magic;
01460         ReadFixedString(instr, magic, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
01461         iHeaderBytes += CCEL_HEADER_LEN;
01462 
01463         // Check if new type.
01464         if (strncmp(magic.c_str(), CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) != 0)
01465         {
01466                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
01467                 return false;
01468         }
01469 
01470         // Read the version
01471         ReadInt32_I(instr, version);
01472         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01473         m_HeaderData.SetVersion(version);
01474 
01475         // Read the dimensions of the array
01476         int32_t iValue = 0;
01477         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
01478         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01479         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01480         m_HeaderData.SetRows(iValue);
01481         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01482         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01483         m_HeaderData.SetCols(iValue);
01484         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01485         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01486         m_HeaderData.SetCells(iValue);
01487 
01488         // Read the other members.
01489         ReadCString_I(instr, tmpstr);
01490         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01491         iHeaderBytes += tmpstr.size();
01492         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(tmpstr.c_str());
01493 
01494         ReadCString_I(instr,tmpstr);
01495         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01496         iHeaderBytes += tmpstr.size();
01497         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(tmpstr.c_str());
01498 
01499         ReadCString_I(instr, tmpstr);
01500         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01501         iHeaderBytes += tmpstr.size();
01502         m_HeaderData.SetParams(tmpstr.c_str());
01503 
01504         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01505         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01506         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(iValue);
01507 
01508         // Added -- causes backwards compatability issues w/ earlier pre-releases
01509         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
01510         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
01511         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue);
01512 
01513         ReadInt32_I(instr, nSubGrids);
01514         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01515         // This hack needs to be changed. In short, the application of ccel to date
01516         // is on chips with 0 sub grids reported. If we are dealing with a ccel file
01517         // from a pre inclusion of mask values we will get non-zero subgrids. Hence
01518         // the assert:
01519         assert(nSubGrids == 0);
01520 
01521         // Set the chip type and DatHeader
01522         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01523         m_HeaderData.ParseDatHeader();
01524 
01525         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01526         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01527 
01528         // Set grid coordinates
01529         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01530 
01531 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01532         instr.close();
01533 #endif
01534 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01535   gzclose(instr);
01536 #endif
01537 
01538         // Read the remaining data.
01539         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01540                 return true;
01541 
01542         // Memory map file
01543 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_MEMMAP
01544 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01545         SYSTEM_INFO info;
01546         GetSystemInfo(&info);
01547         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
01548                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
01549         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
01550         {
01551                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01552                 return false;
01553         }
01554         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
01555         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
01556         {
01557                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
01558                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
01559                 {
01560                         Close();
01561                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
01562                         return false;
01563                 }
01564                 else
01565                 {
01566                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
01567                 }
01568         }
01569 #else
01570         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
01571         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
01572         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
01573         if (m_File == NULL)
01574         {
01575                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01576                 return false;
01577         }
01578         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
01579         delete [] szBuffer;
01580 
01581     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
01582     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
01583 #ifdef __CYGWIN__
01584         cellf_page_offset -= 1;
01585 #endif
01586     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
01587     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
01588     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
01589         {
01590                 Close();
01591     static char buf[2048];
01592     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
01593                 SetError(buf);
01594                 return false;
01595         }
01596         else
01597         {
01598                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
01599         }
01600         if (m_File != NULL) 
01601         {
01602                 fclose(m_File);
01603                 m_File = NULL;
01604         }
01605 #endif
01606 #else
01607   // no-mem-map
01608   int alloc_size=(20*1024)+
01609     ((SHORT_SIZE)*(GetRows()*GetCols())) + // row*col
01610     ((SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)             * GetNumMasked()) + // masked
01611     ((SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)             * GetNumOutliers()); // outliers
01612   m_lpData=new char[alloc_size];
01613 
01614 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01615   instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(),std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01616   instr.seekg(iHeaderBytes,std::ios::beg);
01617   instr.read(m_lpData,alloc_size-iHeaderBytes);
01618 #endif
01619 
01620 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01621   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
01622   gzseek(instr,iHeaderBytes,SEEK_SET);
01623   int read_size=gzread(instr,m_lpData,alloc_size);
01624   //printf("### CCELFileData::ReadCompactCelFile('%s')=%d (alloc=%d)\n",tmp_FileName.c_str(),read_size,alloc_size);
01625   gzclose(instr);
01626 #endif
01627 #endif
01628 
01629         // Read the Mean data
01630         m_pMeanIntensities = (uint16_t*)m_lpData;
01631 
01632         // Read the mask data
01633         int16_t x=0;
01634         int16_t y=0;
01635         int iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * USHORT_SIZE;
01636         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01637         {
01638                 for (int iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
01639                 {
01640                         // Read the coordinate.
01641                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * USHORT_SIZE)));
01642                         //x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01643                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * USHORT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE)));
01644 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01645                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01646                 }
01647         }
01648         else
01649                 m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01650                 
01651         retVal = true;
01652         return retVal;
01653 }
01654   
01661 void CCELFileData::EnsureNotMmapped() 
01662 {
01663         // skip if not mmapped...
01664         if (m_lpFileMap==NULL)
01665         {
01666                 return;
01667         }
01668 
01669         // it is mmapped, so fix it.
01670         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL) // the (short,short,char) format
01671         { 
01672                 assert(m_pTransciptomeEntries != NULL);
01673 
01674                 // duplicate the data
01675                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType);
01676                 CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType *tmpptr = (CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType *) malloc(bytecnt);
01677                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pTransciptomeEntries, bytecnt);
01678 
01679                 // discard the old map
01680                 Munmap();
01681 
01682                 // put it in place
01683                 m_pTransciptomeEntries = tmpptr;
01684         } 
01685         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) // the (float,float,short) format
01686         { 
01687                 assert(m_pEntries != NULL);
01688 
01689                 // duplicate the data
01690                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(CELFileEntryType);
01691                 CELFileEntryType *tmpptr = (CELFileEntryType *) malloc(bytecnt);
01692                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pEntries, bytecnt);
01693 
01694                 // discard the old map
01695                 Munmap();
01696 
01697                 // put it in place
01698                 m_pEntries = tmpptr;
01699         }
01700         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) // the (short) format
01701         { 
01702                 assert(m_pMeanIntensities != NULL);
01703 
01704                 // duplicate the data
01705                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(unsigned short);
01706                 unsigned short *tmpptr = (unsigned short *) malloc(bytecnt);
01707                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pMeanIntensities, bytecnt);
01708 
01709                 // discard the old map
01710                 Munmap();
01711 
01712                 // put it in place
01713                 m_pMeanIntensities = tmpptr;
01714         }
01715 }
01716 
01727 bool CCELFileData::ReadTextCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
01728 {
01729         bool retVal = false;
01730   std::string tmp_FileName;
01731   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
01732   if (tmp_FileName=="") {
01733     SetError("Cant find file: '"+m_FileName+"'");
01734     return false;
01735   }
01736 
01737   //#ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01738         // Open the file.
01739         std::ifstream instr;
01740         instr.open(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
01741         // Check if open
01742         if (!instr)
01743         {
01744                 SetError("Unable to open the file." " (stdstream)");
01745                 return false;
01746         }
01747   //#endif
01748 //#ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01749 //  gzFile instr;
01750 //  instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
01751 //  if (instr==NULL) {
01752 //    SetError("Unable to open the file." " (gzopen)");
01753 //  }
01754 //#endif
01755 
01756         Clear();
01757 
01758         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 4096;
01759         char pszHeader[MAXLINELENGTH];
01760         char tempStr[MAXLINELENGTH];
01761 
01762         // Extract a line of header
01763   //#ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
01764         instr.getline(pszHeader, sizeof(pszHeader));
01765   //#endif
01766 //#ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
01767 //  gzgets(instr,pszHeader,sizeof(pszHeader));
01768 //#endif
01769 
01770         //Determine the version number
01771         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[CEL]",5)==0)
01772                 m_HeaderData.SetVersion(3);
01773         else if (strncmp(pszHeader,"COLS/ROWS=",10)==0)
01774                 m_HeaderData.SetVersion(2);
01775         else
01776         {
01777                 SetError("Unrecognized CEL file format.");
01778                 return false;
01779         }
01780 
01781         //read and store the header
01782         if (m_HeaderData.GetVersion() == 2)
01783         {
01784                 m_HeaderData.SetHeader(pszHeader);
01785                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01786                 m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01787                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01788 
01789                 // Store rows and columns
01790                 int iCols = 0;
01791                 int iRows = 0;
01792                 sscanf(m_HeaderData.GetHeader().c_str(), "COLS/ROWS=%d %d", &iCols, &iRows);
01793                 m_HeaderData.SetCols(iCols);
01794                 m_HeaderData.SetRows(iRows);
01795                 m_HeaderData.SetCells(iCols*iRows);
01796         }
01797         else
01798         {
01799                 bool moreSpace=true;
01800                 //Read past [HEADER] to first line of header data
01801                 while (moreSpace)
01802                 {
01803                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01804                                 return false;
01805                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[HEADER]",8)==0)
01806                                 moreSpace=false;
01807                 }
01808                 int iCols = 0;
01809                 int iRows = 0;
01810                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01811                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Cols=%d",&iCols);
01812                 m_HeaderData.SetCols(iCols);
01813                 m_HeaderData.SetHeader(pszHeader);
01814                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01815                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Rows=%d",&iRows);
01816                 m_HeaderData.SetRows(iRows);
01817                 m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01818                 m_HeaderData.SetCells(iRows*iCols);
01819 
01820                 //Now read the rest of the header
01821                 bool moreHeader=true;
01822                 while (moreHeader)
01823                 {
01824                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01825                                 return false;
01826                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"DatHeader=",10)==0) //Last line of the header
01827                         {
01828                 if (pszHeader[strlen(pszHeader) - 1] == '\r') pszHeader[strlen(pszHeader) - 1] = '\0';
01829                                 m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader(pszHeader + 10);
01830                         }
01831 
01832                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"Algorithm=",10)==0) //Last line of the header
01833                         {
01834                                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Algorithm=%s",tempStr);
01835                                 m_HeaderData.SetAlg(tempStr);
01836                         }
01837 
01838                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"AlgorithmParameters=",20)==0) //Last line of the header
01839                         {
01840                                 sscanf(pszHeader,"AlgorithmParameters=%s",tempStr);
01841                                 m_HeaderData.SetParams(tempStr);
01842                                 moreHeader=false;
01843                         }
01844                         m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01845                 }
01846         }
01847 
01848         // Set the chip type
01849         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01850 
01851         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01852         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01853         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(atoi(m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin").c_str()));
01854 
01855         // Set grid coordinates
01856         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01857 
01858         char paramString[2000];
01859         GridCoordinatesType grid = m_HeaderData.GetGridCorners();
01860         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\nTotalX=%d\nTotalY=%d\nOffsetX=%d\nOffsetY=%d\n"
01861                                 "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\nGridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
01862                                 "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s"
01863                                 "\nAlgorithm=%s\nAlgorithmParameters=",
01864                                 m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01865                                 m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01866                                 0,0,
01867                                 grid.upperleft.x, grid.upperleft.y,
01868                                 grid.upperright.x, grid.upperright.y,
01869                                 grid.lowerright.x, grid.lowerright.y,
01870                                 grid.lowerleft.x, grid.lowerleft.y,
01871                                 0,0,0,
01872                                 m_HeaderData.GetDatHeader().c_str(),
01873                                 m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str());
01874         std::string param = paramString;
01875         param += m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters();
01876         param += "\n";
01877         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(param.c_str());
01878 
01879         // Don't continue if just reading the header.
01880         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01881                 return true;
01882 
01883         // Create memory for Mean data.
01884         m_HeaderData.SetCells(m_HeaderData.GetRows() * m_HeaderData.GetCols());
01885         m_pEntries = new CELFileEntryType[m_HeaderData.GetCells()];
01886 
01887         int t_x,t_y,t_pixels;
01888         float t_mean,t_stdv;
01889 
01890         // Read v2 CEL files
01891         if (m_HeaderData.GetVersion() == 2)
01892         {
01893                 // Write the Mean data
01894                 const char *strCellEntryFormat="%d %d %f %f %d";
01895                 for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++)
01896                 {
01897                         instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01898                         sscanf(pszHeader, strCellEntryFormat,          
01899                                 &t_x,
01900                                 &t_y,
01901                                 &t_mean,
01902                                 &t_stdv,
01903                                 &t_pixels);
01904                         SetIntensity(t_x,t_y,t_mean);
01905                         SetStdv(t_x,t_y,t_stdv);
01906                         SetPixels(t_x,t_y,t_pixels);
01907                 }
01908                 retVal = true;
01909         }
01910         else
01911         {
01912                 //Advance to the beginning of the Mean data
01913                 bool readMore=true;
01914                 while(readMore)
01915                 {
01916                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01917                                 return false;
01918                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[INTENSITY]",11)==0)
01919                                 readMore=false;
01920                 }
01921                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//Data starts at 2 lines past [Mean]
01922                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//Data starts at 2 lines past [Mean]
01923 
01924                 //Read the Mean data
01925                 int iCell=0;
01926                 readMore=true;
01927                 const char *strCellEntryFormat="%d\t%d\t%f\t%f\t%d";
01928 
01929                 while (readMore)
01930                 {
01931                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01932                                 readMore=false;
01933                         else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
01934                                 readMore=false;
01935                         else
01936                         {
01937                                 sscanf(pszHeader, strCellEntryFormat,          
01938                                         &t_x,
01939                                         &t_y,
01940                                         &t_mean,
01941                                         &t_stdv,
01942                                         &t_pixels);
01943                                 SetIntensity(t_x,t_y,t_mean);
01944                                 SetStdv(t_x,t_y,t_stdv);
01945                                 SetPixels(t_x,t_y,t_pixels);
01946                                 ++iCell;
01947                         }
01948                 }
01949 
01950                 //Advance to the Masked data
01951                 readMore=true;
01952                 while(readMore)
01953                 {
01954                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01955                                 return false;
01956                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[MASKS]",7)==0)
01957                                 readMore=false;
01958                 }
01959                 //Read number of masked cells
01960                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01961                 int nMasked=0;
01962                 sscanf(pszHeader, "NumberCells=%d", &nMasked);
01963 
01964                 m_HeaderData.SetMasked(nMasked);
01965                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//skip over the header
01966 
01967                 //Read the masked data
01968                 if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01969                 {
01970                         readMore=true;
01971                         while (readMore)
01972                         {
01973                                 if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01974                                         readMore=false;
01975                                 else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
01976                                         readMore=false;
01977                                 else
01978                                 {
01979                                         int x, y, iCellEntry;
01980                                         sscanf(pszHeader, "%d\t%d", &x, &y);
01981                                         iCellEntry = y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x;
01982                                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(iCellEntry, true));
01983                                 }
01984                         }
01985                 }
01986                 else 
01987                         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01988 
01989                 //Advance to the outlier data
01990                 readMore=true;
01991                 while(readMore)
01992                 {
01993                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01994                                 return false;
01995                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[OUTLIERS]",10)==0)
01996                                 readMore=false;
01997                 }
01998                 //Read number of outlier cells
01999                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
02000                 int nOutliers=0;
02001                 sscanf(pszHeader, "NumberCells=%d", &nOutliers);
02002                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(nOutliers);
02003                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//skip over the header
02004 
02005                 //Read the outlier data
02006                 if (m_bReadOutliers)
02007                 {
02008                         readMore=true;
02009                         while (readMore)
02010                         {
02011                                 if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
02012                                         readMore=false;
02013                                 else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
02014                                         readMore=false;
02015                                 else
02016                                 {
02017                                         int x, y, iCellEntry;
02018                                         sscanf(pszHeader, "%d\t%d", &x, &y);
02019                                         iCellEntry = y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x;
02020                                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(iCellEntry, true));
02021                                 }
02022                         }
02023                 }
02024                 else
02025                         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
02026                 retVal = true;
02027         }
02028         instr.close();
02029         return retVal;
02030 }
02031 
02038 void CCELFileData::Clear()
02039 {
02040   // throw away our memmap on the way out.
02041   Munmap();
02042 
02043         m_HeaderData.Clear();
02044         m_MaskedCells.clear();
02045         m_Outliers.clear();
02046 
02047   delete [] m_pEntries; 
02048   m_pEntries=NULL;
02049   delete [] m_pTransciptomeEntries; 
02050         m_pTransciptomeEntries = NULL;
02051   delete [] m_pMeanIntensities; 
02052         m_pMeanIntensities = NULL;
02053 }
02054 
02061 void CCELFileData::Munmap() 
02062 {
02063         // If there isnt a mapping we dont have to munmap...
02064         if (m_lpFileMap == NULL) {
02065     // ...but we should get rid of memory which might have been alloced.
02066     delete [] m_pEntries;
02067     m_pEntries=NULL;
02068                 return;
02069         }
02070 
02071         // zero out the pointers which are now invalid... 
02072   m_lpData = NULL;
02073         m_pTransciptomeEntries = NULL;
02074         m_pEntries = NULL;
02075         m_pMeanIntensities = NULL;
02076 
02077         // free the map
02078 #ifdef _MSC_VER
02079         if (m_lpFileMap != NULL)
02080         {
02081                 UnmapViewOfFile(m_lpFileMap);
02082                 CloseHandle(m_hFileMap);
02083                 m_hFileMap = NULL;
02084                 CloseHandle(m_hFile);
02085                 m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
02086         }
02087 #else
02088         if ((m_lpFileMap != MAP_FAILED) && (m_lpFileMap != NULL))
02089         {
02090     //printf("=== unmap %p\n",m_lpFileMap); // jhg
02091                 munmap(m_lpFileMap, m_MapLen);
02092                 // m_lpFileMap = MAP_FAILED; // why?
02093                 m_MapLen = 0;
02094                 // should be closed already.
02095                 if (m_File != NULL) 
02096                 {
02097                         fclose(m_File);
02098                         m_File = NULL;
02099                 }
02100         }
02101 #endif
02102   m_lpFileMap=NULL;
02103 }
02104 
02111 void CCELFileData::Close()
02112 {
02113         Clear();
02114 }
02115 
02125 bool CCELFileData::ReadHeader()
02126 {
02127         // Read the header, close if failed.
02128         if (Open(true) == false)
02129         {
02130                 Close();
02131                 return false;
02132         }
02133         return true;
02134 }
02135 
02146 bool CCELFileData::Read(bool bIncludeMaskAndOutliers)
02147 {
02148         m_bReadMaskedCells = bIncludeMaskAndOutliers;
02149         m_bReadOutliers = bIncludeMaskAndOutliers;
02150 
02151         // Open the file
02152         if (Open() == false)
02153         {
02154                 Close();
02155                 return false;
02156         }
02157         return true;
02158 }
02159 
02178 bool CCELFileData::ReadEx(const char *filename, int nState)
02179 {
02180         m_nReadState = nState;
02181 
02182         // Open the file
02183         SetFileName(filename);
02184 
02185         // Determine if outliers should be read
02186         if ((nState & (CEL_ALL | CEL_OUTLIER)))
02187                 this->m_bReadOutliers = true;
02188         else
02189                 this->m_bReadOutliers = false;
02190 
02191         // Determine if masks should be read
02192         if ((nState & (CEL_ALL | CEL_MASK)))
02193                 this->m_bReadMaskedCells = true;
02194         else
02195                 this->m_bReadMaskedCells = false;
02196 
02197         if (Open() == false)
02198         {
02199                 Close();
02200                 return false;
02201         }
02202         return true;
02203 }
02204 
02205 
02207 #define SVALUE_LENGTH 50
02208 
02216 
02217 std::string CCELFileData::GetHeaderKey(const char* key)
02218 {
02219         assert(key != NULL);
02220   // tmp buff for snprintf
02221   char buf[SVALUE_LENGTH+1];
02222 
02223         std::string strKey = key;
02224         std::transform(strKey.begin(), strKey.end(), strKey.begin(), toupper);
02225 
02226         if (strKey == "HEADER") {
02227                 return GetHeaderString();
02228   }
02229         else if (strKey == "VERSION")
02230         {
02231                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetVersion());
02232                 return std::string(buf);
02233         }
02234         else if (strKey == "COLS")
02235         {
02236                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetCols());
02237                 return std::string(buf);
02238         }
02239         else if (strKey == "ROWS")
02240         {
02241                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetRows());
02242                 return std::string(buf);
02243         }
02244         else if (strKey == "TOTALX")
02245         {
02246                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetCols());
02247                 return std::string(buf);
02248         }
02249         else if (strKey == "TOTALY")
02250         {
02251                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetRows());
02252                 return std::string(buf);
02253         }
02254         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERUL")
02255         {
02256                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().upperleft.x, GetGridCorners().upperleft.y);
02257                 return std::string(buf);
02258         }
02259         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERUR")
02260         {
02261                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().upperright.x, GetGridCorners().upperright.y);
02262                 return std::string(buf);
02263         }
02264         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERLL")
02265         {
02266                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().lowerleft.x, GetGridCorners().lowerleft.y);
02267                 return std::string(buf);
02268         }
02269         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERLR")
02270         {
02271                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().lowerright.x, GetGridCorners().lowerright.y);
02272                 return std::string(buf);
02273         }
02274         else if (strKey == "OFFSETX")
02275                 return "0";
02276         else if (strKey == "OFFSETY")
02277                 return "0";
02278         else if (strKey == "AXIS-INVERTX")
02279                 return "0";
02280         else if (strKey == "AXISINVERTY")
02281                 return "0";
02282         else if (strKey == "SWAPXY")
02283                 return "0";
02284         else if (strKey == "DATHEADER")
02285                 return GetDatHeader();
02286         else if (strKey == "ALGORITHM")
02287                 return GetAlg();
02288         else if (strKey == "ALGORITHMPARAMETERS")
02289                 return GetParams();
02290         else if (strKey == "NUMBERCELLS")
02291         {
02292                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumCells());
02293                 return std::string(buf);
02294         }
02295         else if (strKey == "NUMBERMASKEDCELLS")
02296         {
02297                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumMasked());
02298                 return std::string(buf);
02299         }
02300         else if (strKey == "NUMBEROUTLIERCELLS")
02301         {
02302                 snprintf(buf,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumOutliers());
02303                 return std::string(buf);
02304         }
02305   // unknown header...
02306         return "";
02307 }
02308 
02309 #undef SVALUE_LENGTH // dont need this any more.
