02311 
02320 void CCELFileData::GetEntry(int x, int y, CELFileEntryType &entry) 
02321 { 
02322         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02323         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02324 
02325         GetEntry(XYToIndex(x,y), entry); 
02326 }
02327 
02335 void CCELFileData::GetEntry(int index, CELFileEntryType &entry) 
02336 { 
02337         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02338 
02339         entry.Intensity = GetIntensity(index);
02340         entry.Stdv = GetStdv(index);
02341         entry.Pixels = GetPixels(index);
02342 }
02343 
02352 void CCELFileData::GetTranscriptomeEntry(int x, int y, CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType &entry) 
02353 { 
02354         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02355         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02356 
02357         GetTranscriptomeEntry(XYToIndex(x,y), entry); 
02358 }
02359 
02367 void CCELFileData::GetTranscriptomeEntry(int index, CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType &entry) 
02368 { 
02369         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02370 
02371         entry.Intensity = (uint16_t) RoundNumber(GetIntensity(index));
02372         entry.Stdv = (uint16_t) RoundNumber(GetStdv(index));
02373         entry.Pixels = (uint8_t) GetPixels(index);
02374 }
02375 
02384 float CCELFileData::GetIntensity(int x, int y) 
02385 { 
02386         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02387         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02388 
02389         return GetIntensity(XYToIndex(x,y)); 
02390 }
02391 
02399 float CCELFileData::GetIntensity(int index)
02400 {
02401         float fIntensity = 0;
02402 
02403         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02404 
02405         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) 
02406         {
02407                 //fIntensity = m_pEntries[index].Mean;
02408                 fIntensity=MmGetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity);
02409         }
02410         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) 
02411         {
02412                 //fIntensity = GetFloat(&(m_pEntries[index].Intensity), m_FileFormat);
02413                 fIntensity=MmGetFloat_I(&(m_pEntries[index].Intensity));
02414         }
02415         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL) 
02416         {
02417                 //fIntensity = (float) (GetUShort(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity), m_FileFormat));
02418                 fIntensity=MmGetUInt16_N(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity));
02419         }
02420         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) 
02421         {
02422                 //fIntensity = (float) (GetUShort(m_pMeanIntensities + index, m_FileFormat));
02423                 fIntensity=MmGetUInt16_I(&m_pMeanIntensities[index]);
02424         }
02425         else 
02426         {
02427                 assert(0);
02428         }
02429 
02430         return fIntensity;
02431 }
02432 
02433 int CCELFileData::GetIntensities(int index,std::vector<float>& intensities)
02434 {
02435   int idx_start=index;
02436   int idx_end=idx_start+intensities.size();
02437   // the start and end indexes must be valid...
02438         assert((idx_start >= 0) && (idx_end <= m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02439 
02440   // determine the format once, then copy a vectors worth of data.
02441         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) 
02442         {
02443     for (int idx=idx_start;idx<idx_end;idx++) {
02444       intensities[idx]=MmGetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[idx].Intensity);
02445     }
02446   }
02447         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) 
02448         {
02449     for (int idx=idx_start;idx<idx_end;idx++) {
02450       intensities[idx]=MmGetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[idx].Intensity);
02451     }
02452         }
02453         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL) 
02454         {
02455     for (int idx=idx_start;idx<idx_end;idx++) {
02456       intensities[idx]=MmGetUInt16_N(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[idx].Intensity);
02457     }
02458         }
02459         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) 
02460         {
02461     for (int idx=idx_start;idx<idx_end;idx++) {
02462       intensities[idx]=MmGetUInt16_I(&m_pMeanIntensities[idx]);
02463     }
02464         }
02465         else {
02466     // Opps - we dont know what the format was.
02467     assert(0);
02468         }
02469 
02470   return 0;
02471 }
02472 
02473 
02474 
02483 float CCELFileData::GetStdv(int x, int y)
02484 {
02485         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02486         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02487 
02488         return GetStdv(XYToIndex(x,y));
02489 }
02490 
02498 float CCELFileData::GetStdv(int index)
02499 {
02500         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02501 
02502         float fStdev = 0;
02503         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL)
02504                 //fStdev = m_pEntries[index].Stdv;
02505                 fStdev=MmGetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Stdv);
02506         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL)
02507                 //fStdev = GetFloat(&(m_pEntries[index].Stdv), m_FileFormat);
02508                 fStdev=MmGetFloat_I(&(m_pEntries[index].Stdv));
02509         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
02510                 //fStdev = (float) (GetUShort(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv), m_FileFormat));
02511                 fStdev=MmGetUInt16_N(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv));
02512         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL)
02513                 fStdev=0;
02514         else 
02515                 assert(0);
02516 
02517         return fStdev;
02518 }
02519 
02528 short CCELFileData::GetPixels(int x, int y)
02529 {
02530         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02531         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02532 
02533         return GetPixels(XYToIndex(x,y));
02534 }
02535 
02543 short CCELFileData::GetPixels(int index)
02544 {
02545         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02546 
02547         short sPixels = 0;
02548         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL)
02549                 //sPixels = m_pEntries[index].Pixels;
02550                 sPixels=MmGetInt16_I(&m_pEntries[index].Pixels);
02551         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL)
02552                 //sPixels = GetShort(&(m_pEntries[index].Pixels), m_FileFormat);
02553                 sPixels=MmGetInt16_I(&m_pEntries[index].Pixels);
02554         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
02555                 //sPixels = (short) m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Pixels;
02556                 sPixels=MmGetUInt8(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Pixels);
02557         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL)
02558                 sPixels=0;
02559         else 
02560                 assert(0);
02561 
02562         return sPixels;
02563 }
02564 
02573 bool CCELFileData::IsMasked(int x, int y)
02574 {
02575         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02576         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02577 
02578         return IsMasked(XYToIndex(x,y));
02579 }
02580 
02588 bool CCELFileData::IsMasked(int index)
02589 {
02590         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02591 
02592         bool bReturn = false;
02593         std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.find(index);
02594         if (pos != m_MaskedCells.end())
02595                 bReturn = true;
02596         return bReturn;
02597 }
02598 
02607 bool CCELFileData::IsOutlier(int x, int y)
02608 {
02609         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02610         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02611 
02612         return IsOutlier(XYToIndex(x,y));
02613 }
02614 
02622 bool CCELFileData::IsOutlier(int index)
02623 {
02624         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02625 
02626         bool bReturn = false;
02627         std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.find(index);
02628         if (pos != m_Outliers.end())
02629                 bReturn = true;
02630         return bReturn;
02631 }
02632 
02639 bool CCELFileData::IsXDACompatibleFile()
02640 {
02641   std::string tmp_FileName;
02642   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02643 
02644 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02645         // Open the file.
02646         std::ifstream instr(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02647         if (!instr)
02648                 return 0;
02649 #endif
02650 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02651   gzFile instr;
02652   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
02653   if (instr==NULL) {
02654     return 0;
02655   }
02656 #endif
02657 
02658         // Read the magic number from the file.
02659         uint32_t magic=0;
02660         ReadUInt32_I(instr, magic);
02661         bool bXDAFile = ((magic == CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER) ? true : false);
02662 
02663 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02664         instr.close();
02665 #endif
02666 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02667   gzclose(instr);
02668 #endif
02669 
02670         return bXDAFile;
02671 }
02672 
02679 bool CCELFileData::IsVersion3CompatibleFile()
02680 {
02681         // Open the file.
02682         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
02683         if (!instr)
02684                 return false;
02685 
02686         bool status = false;
02687         const char *Version3Line = "[CEL]";
02688         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 16;
02689         char pszHeader[MAXLINELENGTH];
02690 
02691         // Extract the first line which should be [CEL] for a version 3 file
02692         instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
02693         if (strncmp(pszHeader,Version3Line,strlen(Version3Line))==0)
02694                 status = true;
02695         instr.close();
02696         return status;
02697 }
02698 
02705 bool CCELFileData::IsTranscriptomeBcelFile()
02706 {
02707   std::string tmp_FileName;
02708   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02709 
02710         // Open the file.
02711 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02712         std::ifstream instr(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02713         if (!instr) {
02714                 return 0;
02715   }
02716 #endif
02717 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02718   gzFile instr;
02719   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
02720   if (instr==NULL) {
02721     return 0;
02722   }
02723 #endif
02724 
02725         // Read the header marker from the file.
02726         char szMarker[BCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02727         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, BCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02728         bool bTranscriptomeFile = false;
02729         if (strncmp(szMarker, BCEL_HEADER_BYTES, BCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02730                 bTranscriptomeFile = true;
02731 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02732         instr.close();
02733 #endif
02734 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02735   gzclose(instr);
02736 #endif
02737 
02738         return bTranscriptomeFile;
02739 }
02740 
02747 bool CCELFileData::IsCompactCelFile()
02748 {
02749   std::string tmp_FileName;
02750   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02751 
02752         // Open the file.
02753 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02754         std::ifstream instr(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02755         if (!instr) {
02756                 return 0;
02757   }
02758 #endif
02759 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02760   gzFile instr;
02761   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02762   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
02763   if (instr==NULL) {
02764     return 0;
02765   }
02766 #endif
02767 
02768         // Read the header marker from the file.
02769         char szMarker[CCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02770         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02771         bool bCompactCelFile = false;
02772         if (strncmp(szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02773                 bCompactCelFile = true;
02774 
02775 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02776         instr.close();
02777 #endif
02778 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02779   gzclose(instr);
02780 #endif
02781 
02782         return bCompactCelFile;
02783 }
02784 
02791 bool CCELFileData::IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile()
02792 {
02793   std::string tmp_FileName;
02794   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02795 
02796 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02797         // Open the file.
02798         std::ifstream instr(tmp_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02799         if (!instr)
02800                 return 0;
02801 #endif
02802 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02803   gzFile instr;
02804   tmp_FileName=ResolveName();
02805   instr=gzopen(tmp_FileName.c_str(),"rb");
02806   if (instr==NULL) {
02807     return 0;
02808   }
02809 #endif
02810 
02811         // Read the header marker from the file.
02812         char szMarker[CCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02813         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02814         bool bCompactCelFile = false;
02815         if (strncmp(szMarker, OLD_CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02816                 bCompactCelFile = true;
02817 
02818 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_STDSTREAM
02819         instr.close();
02820 #endif
02821 #ifdef CELFILE_USE_ZLIB
02822   gzclose(instr);
02823 #endif
02824 
02825         return bCompactCelFile;
02826 }
02827 
02836 void CCELFileData::DetermineFileFormat()
02837 {
02838         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
02839                 m_FileFormat = XDA_BCEL;
02840         else if (IsTranscriptomeBcelFile())
02841                 m_FileFormat = TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL;
02842         else if (IsCompactCelFile())
02843                 m_FileFormat = COMPACT_BCEL;
02844         else if (IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile())
02845                 m_FileFormat = 0;
02846         else
02847                 m_FileFormat = TEXT_CEL;
02848 }
02849 
02850 
02862 unsigned short CCELFileData::RoundNumber(float f)
02863 {
02864         assert(f >= 0);
02865         unsigned short us = (unsigned short) f;
02866         if((f - (float) us) >= 0.5)
02867                 us++;
02868         return us;
02869 }

02877 CCELFileData::CCELFileData()
02878 {
02879         m_strError = "";
02880         m_FileName = "";
02881         m_pEntries = NULL;
02882         m_pTransciptomeEntries = NULL;
02883         m_pMeanIntensities = NULL;
02884         m_FileFormat = XDA_BCEL;
02885         m_lpFileMap = NULL;
02886         m_lpData = NULL;
02887         m_bReadMaskedCells = true;
02888         m_bReadOutliers = true;
02889         m_nReadState = CEL_ALL;
02890 }
02891 
02898 CCELFileData::~CCELFileData()
02899 {
02900         Clear();
02901 }

03001 void CCELFileData::SetFileFormat(int i) 
03002 { 
03003         assert((i >= TEXT_CEL) && (i <= COMPACT_BCEL)); 
03004         m_FileFormat = i; 
03005 }
03006 
03015 void CCELFileData::SetDimensions(int rows, int cols)
03016 {
03017         m_HeaderData.SetRows(rows);
03018         m_HeaderData.SetCols(cols);
03019         m_HeaderData.SetCells(rows * cols);
03020         GridCoordinatesType grid;
03021         grid.upperleft.x = 1;
03022         grid.upperleft.y = 1;
03023         grid.upperright.x = cols;
03024         grid.upperright.y = 1;
03025         grid.lowerleft.x = 1;
03026         grid.lowerleft.y = rows;
03027         grid.lowerright.x = cols;
03028         grid.lowerright.y = rows;
03029         m_HeaderData.SetGridCorners(grid);
03030 
03032   // delete [] m_lpData;
03033   // m_lpData=NULL;
03034         delete [] m_pEntries;
03035   m_pEntries=NULL;
03036         delete [] m_pTransciptomeEntries;
03037   m_pTransciptomeEntries=NULL;
03038   
03039         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
03040                 m_pTransciptomeEntries = new CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType[rows*cols];
03041         else if ((m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) || (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL))
03042                 m_pEntries = new CELFileEntryType[rows*cols];
03043         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL)
03044                 m_pMeanIntensities = new unsigned short[rows*cols];
03045 }
03046 
03054 void CCELFileData::SetChipType(const char *str)
03055 {
03056         assert(str != NULL);
03057         m_HeaderData.SetChipType(str);
03058         
03059         std::string strHeader = m_HeaderData.GetHeader();
03060 
03061         // Set the chip type in the header string.
03062         int endIndex = (int) strHeader.find(".1sq");
03063         int startIndex = (int) strHeader.rfind(" ", endIndex);
03064         int length = (int) strHeader.length();
03065 
03066         std::string start = strHeader.substr(0, startIndex + 1);
03067         std::string end = strHeader.substr(endIndex, length - endIndex);
03068         std::string newHeader = start + m_HeaderData.GetChipType() + end;
03069         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(newHeader.c_str());
03070 }

03171 void CCELFileData::SetIntensity(int x, int y, float intensity)
03172 {
03173         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
03174         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
03175 
03176         SetIntensity(XYToIndex(x,y), intensity);
03177 }
03178 
03187 void CCELFileData::SetIntensity(int index, float intensity)
03188 {
03189         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03190 
03191         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) 
03192         {
03193                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity,intensity);
03194         }
03195         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) 
03196         {
03197                 //m_pEntries[index].Mean = GetFloat(&intensity, m_FileFormat);
03198                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity,intensity);
03199         }
03200         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)    
03201         {
03202                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(intensity);
03203                 MmSetUInt16_N(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity,s);
03204         }
03205         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) 
03206         {
03207                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(intensity);
03208                 //m_pMeanIntensities[index] = GetUShort(&s, m_FileFormat);
03209                 MmSetUInt16_I(&m_pMeanIntensities[index],s);
03210         }
03211         else 
03212         {
03213                 assert(0);
03214         }
03215 }
03216

03242 void CCELFileData::SetStdv(int index, float stdev)
03243 {
03244         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03245 
03246         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
03247         {
03248                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(stdev);
03249                 //m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv = GetUShort(&s, m_FileFormat);
03250                 MmSetUInt16_N(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv,s);
03251         }
03252         else if ((m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) || (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL))
03253                 //m_pEntries[index].Stdv = GetFloat(&stdev, m_FileFormat);
03254                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Stdv,stdev);
03255         else if (m_FileFormat != COMPACT_BCEL) 
03256             assert(0);
03257 }

03284 void CCELFileData::SetPixels(int index, short pixels)
03285 {
03286         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03287 
03288         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
03289                 //m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Pixels = (unsigned char) pixels;
03290     MmSetUInt8(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Pixels,(uint8_t)pixels);
03291         else if ((m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) || (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL))
03292                 //m_pEntries[index].Pixels = GetShort(&pixels, m_FileFormat);
03293                 MmSetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)&m_pEntries[index].Pixels,(uint16_t)pixels);
03294         else if (m_FileFormat != COMPACT_BCEL) 
03295             assert(0);

03307 void CCELFileData::SetMask(int x, int y, bool masked)
03308 {
03309         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
03310         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));

03314 
03323 void CCELFileData::SetMask(int index, bool masked)
03324 {
03325         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03326 
03327         if (masked)
03328         {
03329                 m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(index, true));
03330                 m_HeaderData.IncrementMasked();
03331         }
03332         else
03333         {
03334                 std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.find(index);
03335                 if (pos != m_MaskedCells.end())
03336                 {
03337                         m_MaskedCells.erase(pos);
03338                         m_HeaderData.DecrementMasked();
03339                 }
03340         }
03341 }

03359 
03368 void CCELFileData::SetOutlier(int index, bool outlier)
03369 {
03370         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03371 
03372         if (outlier)
03373         {
03374                 m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(index, true));
03375                 m_HeaderData.IncrementOutliers();
03376         }
03377         else
03378         {
03379                 std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.find(index);
03380                 if (pos != m_Outliers.end())
03381                 {
03382                         m_Outliers.erase(pos);
03383                         m_HeaderData.DecrementOutliers();
03384                 }
03385         }
03386 }
